name: Shop Shooting Me!
description: Stop Shooting Me is a local co-operative third person platforming game that tasks two Alien Creatures with escaping the diabolical laboratory that they are trapped within whilst having to avoid the wrath of an unstoppable experiment. Working together, players have to outwit the lab’s security systems, overcome puzzling obstacles and even deal with some of the other unsatisfactory occupants of the lab. Featuring eight levels, an arsenal of weaponry, a smorgasbord of physics based puzzles and a unique twist on how the world is viewed, Stop Shooting Me is sure to be an adventure that delights intrigues frustrates entertain you and a friend for hours.
